summary: Implements a dataset class that reads a tab‑separated file containing sentences and their labels, tokenizes the text using a configurable tokenizer, truncates or pads sequences to a fixed length, optionally samples a subset of the data, shuffles entries, caches processed tensors, and supplies PyTorch‑compatible indexing, length, collate, and feature‑extraction methods for integration with NeMo data‑layer pipelines.
business_intent: Enable efficient loading, preprocessing, and batching of text classification data for training and evaluating neural models within the NeMo framework.
